visualization_lsh
=================

.. py:module:: visualization_lsh


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   visualization_lsh.plot_s_curves


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: plot_s_curves(fixed_r, fixed_b, s_range)

   Plots S-curves for two configurations: varying b with fixed r and varying r with fixed b.

   :param fixed_r: The fixed r value to plot S-curves while varying b.
   :param fixed_b: The fixed b value to plot S-curves while varying r.
   :param s_range: Range of similarity values (0 to 1).
